thread.section_title: Melia Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Courbevoie, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay and Great Location
thread.title_full: Great Stay and Great Location - Review of Melia Paris La Defense, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: 10Dots
title: Great Stay and Great Location
text: Stayed at La Defense for 2 nights. I had the level lounge upgrade. The lounge has great food and drinks and great service. When I arrived with a group from the states they welcomed us with small US flags hanging. They do the extra touch to make you feel welcome. The rooms are spacious and well appointed. I felt very comfortable. There is a Metro right in front of the hotel and is an easy commute to city center.
